data.strFullDescription:
[p][b]Grocery Store Tycoon - First Shop[/b]讓玩家通過管理和擴展他們的第一家商店，踏出成為店主的第一步。從一家小店開始，優化其佈局，高效補貨，並為顧客服務，以擴展您的業務。仔細的計劃和策略性的決策將是將您謙遜的起點變成繁榮超市的關鍵！
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/4af17b5c06bd7b1662bc0107b18d7414.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/4af17b5c06bd7b1662bc0107b18d7414.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="240"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="235" height="51"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/4c0a7dd42299041176b108de2b43342b.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]如果您想挑戰您最佳收銀員的速度，或僅僅是不想支付工資，可以自己操作收銀機。盡可能快速刷卡以避免長時間排隊和不滿的顧客。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/0824d004d4226990a68db3f273f9983a.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/0824d004d4226990a68db3f273f9983a.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="233" height="50"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/b0d5d93b6170f25aa35d512bca01b2e8.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]通過一次從倉庫搬運一箱貨物來補貨，或者使用推車運輸更大量的貨物。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/551c3652692f8d6183b4198c75e55da8.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/551c3652692f8d6183b4198c75e55da8.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="231" height="45"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/98bc8071c9475bf131a1b379fcfb2fe9.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]購買可放置物品，如收銀機、貨架、冷藏櫃、冷凍櫃、農產品貨架、購物車圍欄、購物籃架、物料搬運設備和裝飾品。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/874c3f73352aa319dec204803a23239f.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/874c3f73352aa319dec204803a23239f.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="236" height="46"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/77634084f83f82e83dc94d31fd3d2908.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]互動式用戶界面，通過顧客統計、商品的供需、價格調整、可放置物品狀況查看及員工管理來管理您的商店。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/d2053e01bb645f55e99e1f49a0fc0253.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/d2053e01bb645f55e99e1f49a0fc0253.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="237" height="47"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/bc10793c2e72f58341e0d1a3bb6192d3.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]通過被動地獲取經驗、工作或完成額外目標來解鎖物品類型、可放置物品、管理工具、員工招聘能力、商店擴展以及購買其他商店的機會。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/01cc92c263f5431393ae2536036d42e7.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/01cc92c263f5431393ae2536036d42e7.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="231" height="51"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/84b60be621a39ec7696c8a4947ac2fd1.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]維護可放置物品、歸還推車和購物籃，保持商店清潔以保持您的商店運行在最佳狀態。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/ee1e97cb2d045d942e9fa6475b1e3ad2.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/ee1e97cb2d045d942e9fa6475b1e3ad2.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="237" height="46"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/024b3ae4f2b89f2e514b7ac025980eea.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]管理員工以保持他們的滿意度，否則他們可能會辭職！為員工分配他們想要的工作、工資以及不過度工作，這些都會影響員工的滿意度。不可靠的員工可能會打電話請假，影響您的滿意度。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/478114bd07d1eef7798a5a98252efffe.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/478114bd07d1eef7798a5a98252efffe.webm?t=1748897871" width="480" height="272"][/imgvid]
[/p][p][img width="232" height="53"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/e81dd7547c75c891af8d8e5968feb114.webp?t=1748897871[/img][/p][p]顧客必須滿意才能獲得好評並保持您的商店良好的聲譽。擁有他們尋找的商品，讓他們在店內停留的時間盡可能短，以及在收銀機後面擁有魅力的員工，這些都會影響顧客的滿意度。
[/p][p]
[/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/2e46e8fe86220fb5cb427f94f043e643.poster.avif?t=1748897871" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3432530/extras/2e46e8fe86220fb5cb427f94f043e643.webm?t=1748897871" width="600" height="340"][/imgvid]
data.strSnippet: Grocery Store Tycoon - First Shop讓玩家通過管理和擴展他們的第一家商店，踏出成為店主的第一步。從一家小店開始，優化其佈局，高效補貨，並為顧客服務，以擴展您的業務。
